mods.abstract: Typed invoice for an order placed by Mr. Billy Denny for Heritage Posters for two orders of 100 two color jumbos (half sheets) for Hank Williams and his Drifting Cowboys at the Canton Memorial Auditorium on New Year's Day 1953 and for Jim Reeves and the Lonely Blue Boys at the City Auditorium on May 21, 1961. Receipt indicates agreed price, size, order quantity, shipping location and description of the posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
